name: Create Channel
description: Create a channel in the server

name: Delete Channel
description: Delete a channel from the server

name: Create Role
description: Create a (mentionable) role either with a specified color or with default.

name: Delete Role
description: Delete a role

name: Rename Role
description: Rename a role

name: Bulk DM
description: Send the same message to multiple members (or every member) of the server as a direct message

name: Kick Member
description: Kick a member from the server

name: Ban Member
description: Ban a member from a server

name: Warn Member
description: Warn a member with a warning message in the channel as well as a direct message

name: Purge
description: Bulk delete messages upto 100 under 14 days old

name: Set
description:
Change server settings. Commands include:
`filter`
`memberlog`
`serverlog`
`prefix`
`autorole`
`autowelcome`
example:
set filter links #channel on
set filter invites #channel off
set filter profanity #channel on```
```set memberlog true```
```set serverlog true```
```set prefix !
```set autorole @role```
```set autowelcome true```

name: Settings
description: Get current settings for the server

name: Init
description: Reset all server settings for Terone

name: Welcome
description: Welcome an existing member (new members are automatically welcomed)

name: Say
description: Make me say something on the channel

name: Translate
description: Translate a given word/sentence to most languages
example:
++translate english spanish Hello 

++translate auto spanish Hello

name: Weather
description: Get the weather of almost any location

name: News
description: Get news about topics

name: Video
description: Get video about topics

name: Avatar
description: Get the avatar of a member

name: Contact Support
description: Request support from official Terone staff

name: Cancel Support
description: Cancel support request

name: Music Help
description: Get help regarding music commands

name: IGN
description:
Store, display and remove your IGNs. Commands include ```add
delete
show```
example:
++ign add @game myIGN
++ign delete @game myIGN
++ign show @game
++ign show all
